rules_text:
Whenever this creature becomes tapped, create a 1/1 red Soldier creature token with break. [i](When this creature deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one other target creature.)[/i]
Other Soldiers you control crew vehicles as though their power was 1 greater.
notes: 2.1.0: Now a 5-mana 5/3. Should delay when this card can start taking over the game, while also letting it crew the ferronis.
